content: HTB Toggle bolt Economical toggle bolt hollow wall anchor for fastening heavier loads to concrete blocks, masonry and drywall ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Mechanical anchors- - ### FEATURES:Features Higher load capacity – toggle bolts are among the strongest fastening options for hollow walls, see technical datasheet for full details Practical and economical – these nylon toggle anchors are a lower-cost solution for fastening to hollow walls, especially when you can only access only one side of the wall Allows future modifications – the fastening point remains in wall even after the fixture has been unscrewed Designed for easier installation – multiple design features, including a spring mechanism and anti-spin teeth, help you to install these anchors correctly and quickly every time Applications Fastening to drywall and hollow block walls (max. thickness 3) ### TECHNICAL DATA: Environmental conditions: Indoor, dry conditions Material composition: Plastic, Steel, zinc-plated Technical Data | Environmental conditions | Indoor, dry conditions | Material composition | Plastic, Steel, zinc-plated | Type of fixing (global) | Pre-fastening ### ITEMS- 2158775 - Drywall Anchor HTB-2 1/2 - Package Size 25 pc Package Contents: - 1x HTB-2 1/2 Hollow wall met. anchor assy - 2158776 - Drywall Anchor HTB-2 1/2 Slotted Screw - Package Size 25 pc Package Contents: - 1x HTB-2-S 1/2 SRH Hollow wall met. anchor assy - 2158770 - Drywall Anchor HTB-2 ¼ w/o Screw - Package Size 100 pc Package Contents: - 1x HTB-2 1/4 Hollow wall met. anchor assy - 2158771 - Drywall Anchor HTB-2 1/4 Phillips Screw - Package Size 100 pc Package Contents: - 1x HTB-2-S 1/4 PH Hollow wall met. anchor assy - 2158772 - Drywall Anchor HTB-2 1/4 Slotted Screw - Package Size 100 pc Package Contents: - 1x HTB-2-S 1/4 SRH Hollow wall met. anchor assy - 2158767 - Drywall Anchor HTB-2 3/16 w/o Screw - Package Size 100 pc Package Contents: - 1x HTB-2 3/16 Hollow wall met. anchor assy - 2158768 - Drywall Anchor HTB-2 3/16 Phillips Screw - Package Size 100 pc Package Contents: - 1x HTB-2-S 3/16 PH Hollow wall met. anchor assy - 2158769 - Drywall Anchor HTB-2 3/16 Slotted Screw - Package Size 100 pc Package Contents: - 1x HTB-2-S 3/16 SRH Hollow wall met. anchor assy
